info.title: Transfer Search
info.description:
Before using this API, we recommend you read our **[Authorization Guide](https://developers.amadeus.com/self-service/apis-docs/guides/authorization-262)** for more information on how to generate an access token. 

Please also be aware that our test environment is based on a subset of the production for this API it may change dynamically. For your tests, use big cities like LON (London) or NYC (New-York).

startDateTime.description: date and time specified in the [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss format e.g. 2017-11-10T10:00:00

passengers.description: the number of passengers, e.g. 3. Default value is 1

startLocationCode.description: location from [IATA table codes](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx), e.g. CDG. Location could be defined either using location code or address (address line, zip code, country code, city, geo code)

startUicCode.description: UIC code defined by the worldwide railway organization e.g. 8600626

startLfiCode.description:
internal airport identifier used for private jets and helicopters
Example: FR84734

startAddressLine.description: street address including building number, e.g. 5 Avenue Anatole France

startCountryCode.description: country of the pick-up location with [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) format (e.g. US)

startGeoCode.description:
latitude and longitude of geographical location following the structure {latitude},{longitude}
Example: 48.858093,2.294694

startName.description: place name e.g. Airport Name, Hotel Name etc.

startGooglePlaceId.description: google place id only for google address e.g. ChIJL-DOWeBv5kcRfTbh97PimNc.

endLocationCode.description: location from [IATA table codes](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx), e.g. CDG. Optional, for transferType = HOURLY. Location could be defined either using location code or address (address line, zip code, country code, city, geo code)

endUicCode.description: UIC code defined by the worldwide railway organization e.g. 8600626

endLfiCode.description:
internal airport identifier used for private jets and helicopters
Example: SP68724

endAddressLine.description: street address, e.g. 5 Avenue Anatole France

endCountryCode.description: country of the location with [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) format (e.g. US)

endGeoCode.description:
latitude and longitude of geographical location following the structure {latitude},{longitude}
Example: 48.858093,2.294694

endName.description: place name e.g. Airport Name, Hotel Name etc.

endGooglePlaceId.description: google place id only for google address e.g. ChIJL-DOWeBv5kcRfTbh97PimNc.

transferType.description:
a transfer service type
Example: PRIVATE

value           | description
--------------  | ------------------------
PRIVATE         | Private transfer from point to point
SHARED          | Shared transfer from point to point
TAXI            | Taxi reservation from point to point, price is estimated
HOURLY          | Chauffeured driven transfer per hour
AIRPORT_EXPRESS | Express Train from/to Airport
AIRPORT_BUS     | Express Bus from/to Airport
HELICOPTER      | Private helicopter flight from/to airport
PRIVATE_JET     | Private flight from airport to airport

If not filled, all transfer service types are requested

duration.description: transfer duration in [ISO8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) PnYnMnDTnHnMnS format, e.g. PT2H10M. It is used and mandatory for transferType = HOURLY

language.description: code of the preferred language to be used in [ISO 639-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_639-1) format, e.g. EN

currency.description: the preferred currency for the transfer offers. Currency is specified in the [ISO 4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) format, e.g. EUR for Euro

vehicleCategory.description:
a vehicle category
Example: BU

code  | name
----- | -------------------------------------
ST    | Standard Class
BU    | Business Class
FC    | First Class

If not filled, all vehicle categories are requested

vehicleCode.description:
a vehicle type code
Example: VAN

code   | name
------ | -------------------------------------
MBK    | Motorcycle
CAR    | Car
SED    | Sedan
WGN    | Wagon
ELC    | Electric car
VAN    | Van or minivan
SUV    | Sport utility vehicle
LMS    | Limousine
TRN    | Train
BUS    | Bus
HLC    | Helicopter
JET    | Jet

If not filled, all vehicle types are requested

providerCodes.description:
transfer provider codes, comma-separated. If not filled, the request is sent to all providers
Example: TXO,FGT

baggages.description: the number of baggages to be supported by the vehicle. If specified, this number should be greater than or equal to 0

discountNumbers.description:
transfer provider discount numbers, which could be used to get negotiated or discounted rates. Comma separated array with the following structure: {providerCode}|{discountType}|{discountNumber}.
Example: ABC|CD|1122-DD-22, where providerCode=ABC, discountType=CD and discountNumber=1122-DD-22
Accepted discountType:  "CD" for corporate discount code, "PC" for promotional/campaign discount code

extraServiceCodes.description:
a comma-separated list of extra service codes
Example: EWT,MAG,FLM

code   | name
------ | ----------------------------
DSL    | Driver language specified
EWT    | Extra waiting time
MAG    | Meet & Greet
FLM    | Flight monitoring
NWS    | Newspaper
CAI    | Cancellation insurance
WNR    | Wait and Return. Driver waits at destination and brings back the customer to pick-up point

equipmentCodes.description:
a comma-separated list of extra equipment codes
Example: CBS,BYC

code   | name
------ | -------------------------------------
BBS    | Baby stroller/Push chair
BYC    | Bicycle rack
CBB    | Cargo barrier rack
CBF    | Cargo barrier front
CBS    | Booster seat for child under 135cm or up to 12 years
CSB    | Child seat determined by weight/age of child 1-3 years / 9-18 Kg
CSI    | Child seat determined by weight/age of child 0-12 month/0-13Kg
CST    | Child seat determined by weight/age of child 4-7 years/15 – 30 Kg
SBR    | Snow board racks
SKB    | Ski box
SKR    | Ski rack
TAB    | Travel Tablet 
WAR    | Wheelchair access ramp
WHC    | Wheelchair
WIF    | Wi-Fi access
CNT    | Charger cable

reference.description: reference of the Trip e.g. YNK4JQ

stopOvers.description: Location of the stop over or the several stop over points. It can be defined either using IATA code or Address (address line, zip, country, city, state, latitude, longitude, lfi). Vehicle change via stop overs is not supported.

passenegerCharacteristics.description: Describes passenger typeCode and their age.

transferType.description:
amadeus transfer service type

value           | description                                 
--------------  | ------------------------
PRIVATE         | Private transfer from point to point
SHARED          | Shared transfer from point to point
TAXI            | Taxi reservation from point to point, price is estimated
HOURLY          | Chauffeured driven transfer per hour
AIRPORT_EXPRESS | Express Train from/to Airport
AIRPORT_BUS     | Express Bus from/to Airport
HELICOPTER      | Private helicopter flight from/to airport
PRIVATE_JET     | Private flight from airport to airport

duration.description: transfer duration in [ISO8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) PnYnMnDTnHnMnS format, e.g. PT2H10M

methodsOfPaymentAccepted.description: list of payment methods, allowed by provider

items.description: Method of payment required when PaymentType equal BT (applicable only for reservation action).

language.description: code of the preferred language to be used in [ISO 639-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_639-1) format, e.g. EN

line.description: Address line with street, number, bulding, etc...

countryCode.description: Country code (two character standard IATA country code)

stateCode.description: State code (two character standard IATA state code)

line.description: Address line with street, number, bulding, etc...

countryCode.description: Country code (two character standard IATA country code)

stateCode.description: State code (two character standard IATA state code)

size.description:
baggage size

code   | name                                 
------ | ---------------------------- 
S 	   | Small
M 	   | Medium
L 	   | Large

feeType.description: type of fee - percentage of total amount (PERCENTAGE) or fixed amount (VALUE)

feeValue.description: value of the fee, e.g. "100" or "12.50"

currencyCode.description: currency code of the fee in [ISO 4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) format, e.g. USD, EUR

DiscountCode.description: discount object that gives access to negotiated prices

value.description:
discount code value. 
"CD" type stands for corporate discount code - a number generated by provider in case of
  special agreement with a given subscriber is passed (airlines, TMC,
  corporation…). It gives to subscriber access to negotiated prices for
  transfer      
"PC" - for promotional/campaign discount code - a voucher code generated by the
  provider valid for a given period of time or a given number of usage.
  The code is sent by customer to provider in order to get a discounted
  price.

great-circle distance between two locations. This distance thus do not take into account traffic conditions; international boundaries; mountains; water; or other elements that might make the a nearby location hard to reach.

code.description:
extra equipment codes, which can take following values

code   | name                                 
------ | -------------------------------------  
BBS    | Baby stroller/Push chair
BYC    | Bicycle rack
CBB    | Cargo barrier rack
CBF    | Cargo barrier front
CBS    | Booster seat for child under 135cm or up to 12 years
CSB    | Child seat determined by weight/age of child 1-3 years / 9-18 Kg
CSI    | Child seat determined by weight/age of child 0-12 month/0-13Kg
CST    | Child seat determined by weight/age of child 4-7 years/15 – 30 Kg
SBR    | Snow board racks
SKB    | Ski box
SKR    | Ski rack
TAB    | Travel Tablet 
WAR    | Wheelchair access ramp
WHC    | Wheelchair
WIF    | Wi-Fi access
CNT    | Charger cable

isBookable.description: true if extra equipment is available for booking

taxIncluded.description: true if tax included in extra equipment price

includedInTotal.description: true if extra equipment price is included in total transfer amount

code.description:
extra service code, which can take following values

code   | name                                 
------ | ---------------------------- 
DSL    | Driver language specified
EWT    | Extra waiting time
MAG    | Meet & Greet
FLM    | Flight monitoring
NWS    | Newspaper
CAI    | Cancellation insurance
WNR    | Wait and Return. Driver waits at destination and brings back the customer to pick-up point

isBookable.description: true if extra service is available for booking

taxIncluded.description: true if tax included in extra service price

includedInTotal.description: true if extra service price is included in total transfer amount

dateTime.description:
date and time specified in the [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss format e.g. 2017-11-10T10:00:00
not supported for stopOvers object

locationCode.description: airport code from [IATA table codes](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx), e.g. CDG.

lfiCode.description: internal airport identifier used for private jets and helicopters e.g. IT87100

name.description: Place name e.g. Airport Name, Hotel Name etc.

googlePlaceId.description: Google place id only for google address e.g. ChIJL-DOWeBv5kcRfTbh97PimNc.

uicCode.description: UIC code defined by the worldwide railway organization e.g. 8600626

StopOver.description: Location of the stop over or the several stop over points. It can be defined either using IATA code or Address (address line, zip, country, city, state, latitude, longitude, lfi). Vehicle change via stop overs is not supported.

duration.description: transfer stop duration in [ISO8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) PnYnMnDTnHnMnS format, e.g. PT2H10M.

sequenceNumber.description: sequence number of the stop e.g. 3

duration.description: the intermediate stop duration in [ISO8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) PnYnMnDTnHnMnS format, e.g. PT2H10M

locationCode.description: the intermediate stop airport IATA code, e.g. CDG. Location could be defined either using location code or address (address line, zip code, country code, city, geo code)

addressLine.description: the intermediate stop street address including building number, e.g. 5 Avenue Anatole France

countryCode.description: the intermediate stop country, the location with [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) format (e.g. US)

cityName.description: the intermediate stop city name, e.g. Paris

zipCode.description: the intermediate stop postal/zip code, e.g. 75007

googlePlaceId.description: the intermediate stop google place id only for google address e.g. ChIJL-DOWeBv5kcRfTbh97PimNc.

name.description: the intermediate stop name e.g. Airport Name, Hotel Name etc.

lfiCode.description: the intermediate stop internal airport identifier used for private jets and helicopters e.g. IT87100

stateCode.description: the intermediate stop state code according to [ISO 3166-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2)

geoCode.description: the intermediate stop latitude and longitude of geographical location following the structure {latitude},{longitude} e.g. 48.858093,2.294694

sequenceNumber.description: sequence number of the stop e.g. 3

uicCode.description: UIC code defined by the worldwide railway organization e.g. 8600626

passengerTypeCode.description: Passenger type codes e.g. CHD , ADT. CHD is for child and ADT for Adult.

age.description: Age of the Passenger (Mandatory if typeCode= “CHD”)

PartnerInfo.description: Information about partner/subprovider. Below settings configuration is not applicable for sub-provider. Fields 'code', 'name' and 'logoUrl' are not mandatory for sub-provider.

Quotation.description: quotation representing a price valuation and its components. The monetaryAmount at the root are the sum of base and all the taxes/fees/discounts

isEstimated.description: indicates if the price is pre-estimated prior to ride. Becomes mandatory for transferType = TAXI

termsUrl.description: URL to provider's terms and conditions page

isPreferred.description: indicates if sub-provider is preferred for the travel-seller

businessIdentification.description: Information about the Customer stakeholder participating to the described sales summary.

vatRegistrationNumber.description: VAT (Value Added Tax) Registration Number of the customer applicable ot the current sales.

TravelSegment.description: A segment of an itinerary used by a traveler between 2 locations at a given date and time using a particular transportation type FLIGHT or TRAIN

transportationNumber.description: The flight number or train number, e.g. AF380

TravelSegmentLocation.description: The flight or train departure/arrival date&time, location information

uicCode.description: The railway UIC code defined by the worldwide railway organization, e.g. 7400001

iataCode.description: The airport code from IATA table codes, e.g. CDG

localDateTime.description: The date and time inspired from ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS) format

code.description:
vehicle type, which can take following values

value           | description
--------------  | ------------------------
CAR             | Car
SED             | Sedan
WGN             | Wagon
ELC             | Electric car
VAN             | Van or minivan
SUV             | Sport utility vehicle
LMS             | Limousine
MBR             | Motorbike
TRN             | Train
BUS             | Bus
HLC             | Helicopter (accessible only for private jet transfer)
JET             | Jet (accessible only for private jet transfer)

category.description:
category of the vehicle, which can take following values

value           | description
--------------  | ------------------------
ST              | Standard
BU              | Business
FC              | First class

description.description: description of the vehicle. Can describe a list of potential vehicles, e.g. VW Polo or similar

status.description: the HTTP status code applicable to this error

title.description: a short summary of the error

source.title: Issue_Source
source.description: an object containing references to the source of the error

pointer.description: a JSON Pointer [RFC6901] to the associated entity in the request document

parameter.description: a string indicating which URI query parameter caused the issue

example.description: a string indicating an example of the right value

vehicle.description: Mercedes-Benz V-Class, Chevrolet Suburban, Cadillac Escalade or similar

warnings.title: PICK-UP DATE TIME CHANGED
warnings.detail: Transfer pick-up date and time have been changed by provider
